PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: at room temperature.

Let's think step by step.

1. room temperature

The term "room temperature" can be considered a property name as it describes a specific condition or state of a substance or environment. In this context, it refers to the temperature range that is typically comfortable for humans, which is around 68-77 degrees Fahrenheit (20-25 degrees Celsius).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. temperature (as a material property)
2. room temperature (as a specific material property value)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| temperature (as a material property) |
| room temperature (as a specific material property value) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: at room temperature.

Let's think step by step.

1. Room temperature

This is the property value mentioned in the paragraph. It refers to the temperature level of a room.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Room temperature (25°C, 77°F, etc.)

This is the only relevant property value entity mentioned in the paragraph. It refers to the temperature level of a room. All other information, such as "at room temperature," is not considered a property value as it is a descriptive phrase.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".
